trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un elenco ordinato di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> represents the queue of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> objects associated with a workflow instance and provides methods to manage this queue.
trans-unit.target: Una classe <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> rappresenta la coda di oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> associata a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro e fornisce i metodi per gestire questa coda.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions are ordered in the queue based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values; those with smaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values are positioned before those with larger <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni vengono ordinate nella coda in base ai relativi valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>; quelle con i valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> inferiori si trovano prima delle sottoscrizioni con valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> superiori.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods provided by this class to manage the collection of active timer event subscriptions exposed by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> for each workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare i metodi forniti da questa classe per gestire la raccolta di sottoscrizioni dell'evento del timer attive esposta da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> per ogni istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> to add or remove subscriptions from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare i metodi <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%2A> per aggiungere o rimuovere le sottoscrizioni dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Whenever the first element in the timer queue changes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Ogni qualvolta il primo elemento nella coda del timer cambia, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService> viene chiamato per annullare l'evento del timer che precedentemente si trovava all'inizio della coda e pianificare il nuovo evento del timer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to add to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> da aggiungere alla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> alla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> to the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> alla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni nella coda vengono posizionate in base ai loro valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; quelle con i valori inferiori si trovano davanti alle sottoscrizioni con i valori superiori.

trans-unit.source: If the new subscription is added at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to cancel the timer event that was previously at the beginning of the queue and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to schedule the new timer event.
trans-unit.target: Se la nuova sottoscrizione viene aggiunta all'inizio della coda, viene chiamato il metodo, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> per annullare l'evento del timer che si trovava precedentemente all'inizio della coda e il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> per pianificare il nuovo evento del timer.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> locks the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> before adding the new subscription and is, therefore, thread safe.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Add%2A> blocca <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> prima di aggiungere la nuova sottoscrizione ed è, pertanto, thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <see cref="T:System.Array" /> che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzazione di <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve essere in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in <c>array</c> in corrispondenza del quale ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> elements to an existing one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensionale esistente, partendo dall'indice della matrice specificata.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A> è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects in the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> inclusi nella coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects in the queue.
trans-unit.target: Numero di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> nella coda.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che esegue l'iterazione di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> è sincronizzato; tuttavia, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è di per sé una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Un enumeratore rimane valido fino a quando la raccolta non subisce modifiche.

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: In caso di modifiche alla raccolta, ad esempio aggiunta, modifica o eliminazione di elementi, l'enumeratore sarà reso non valido in modo irreversibile e il comportamento corrispondente non sarà definito.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumeratore non dispone di accesso esclusivo alla raccolta, pertanto il processo di enumerazione di una raccolta non è di per sé thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la sicurezza dei thread durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> durante l'intera enumerazione tramite <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" /> indicating that access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre <see langword="true" /> per indicare che l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> è sincronizzato; tuttavia, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è di per sé una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, è possibile che venga modificata da altri thread, con conseguente generazione di un'eccezione da parte dell'enumeratore.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare la raccolta per l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> restituisce un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> at the beginning of the timer queue without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> all'inizio della coda del timer senza rimuoverlo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> at the beginning of the timer queue or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if the timer queue is empty.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> all'inizio della coda del timer o un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) se la coda del timer è vuota.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Peek%2A> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Peek%2A> è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> specificato dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> that has the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> con l'ID di sottoscrizione specificato dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> with the specified subscription id from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> con l'ID di sottoscrizione specificato dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni nella coda vengono posizionate in base ai loro valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; quelle con i valori inferiori si trovano davanti alle sottoscrizioni con i valori superiori.

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se la sottoscrizione rimossa si trovava all'inizio della coda, viene chiamato il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> per annullare l'evento del timer associato a questa sottoscrizione e il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> per pianificare un evento del timer per la sottoscrizione che ora si trova all'inizio della coda.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> to remove from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> da rimuovere dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> from the timer queue.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> dalla coda del timer.

trans-unit.source: Subscriptions in the queue are positioned based on their <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values; those with smaller values are positioned in front of those with larger values.
trans-unit.target: Le sottoscrizioni nella coda vengono posizionate in base ai loro valori <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; quelle con i valori inferiori si trovano davanti alle sottoscrizioni con i valori superiori.

trans-unit.source: If the subscription removed was the subscription at the beginning of the queue, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to cancel the timer event associated with this subscription and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called to schedule a timer event for the subscription that is now at the beginning of the queue.
trans-unit.target: Se la sottoscrizione rimossa si trovava all'inizio della coda, viene chiamato il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> per annullare l'evento del timer associato a questa sottoscrizione e il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService.Schedule%28System.Threading.WaitCallback%2CSystem.Guid%2CSystem.DateTime%2CSystem.Guid%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> per pianificare un evento del timer per la sottoscrizione che ora si trova all'inizio della coda.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.Remove%28System.Guid%29> è thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An object used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> restituisce un oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Access to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> is synchronized; however, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'accesso a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> è sincronizzato; tuttavia, l'enumerazione di una raccolta non è di per sé una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche se una raccolta è sincronizzata, è possibile che venga modificata da altri thread, con conseguente generazione di un'eccezione da parte dell'enumeratore.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> during the entire enumeration by using <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire che una raccolta sia thread-safe durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection> nel corso di tutta l'operazione mediante <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.SyncRoot%2A> oppure rilevare le eccezioni generate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.

trans-unit.source: Timer queue associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: La coda del timer associata a un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: This queue contains time ordered <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> objects for a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Questa coda contiene oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription" /> ordinati in base al tempo per un flusso di lavoro.
